- type: dropdown
  attributes:
    label: Content Type
    options:

  attributes:
    label: Section Target
    options:
      - Get Started
      - Learn
      - Build
      - Maintain
- type: dropdown
  attributes:
    label: Layer
    options:
      - Layer 1 - Tangle/DAG
      - Layer 2 - ISC & etc.
